maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: CrossCentral
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: CrossCentral

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Hau Ling
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Хау Линг

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Ah... Another bird approaches me. Welcome, bird!
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Ах... Ещё одна птица прилетела. Добро пожаловать, птица!

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Hi?
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Привет?

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: The bird is trying to find a worm, but a \c[3]bug\c[0] is what it needs to catch.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Птица пытается найти червя, но \c[3]жук\c[0] - это то, что ей нужно поймать.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: To the \c[3]south\c[0] is where the bird needs to fly, through \c[3]bamboo trees\c[0] and beyond.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: На \c[3]юг\c[0], вот куда птица должна лететь, через \c[3]бамбуковые заросли\c[0] и за их пределы.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: And by \c[3]a pond and a fire\c[0] it needs to land.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: И у \c[3]пруда и огня\c[0] она должна приземлиться.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Now fly, little bird, fly and let the wind carry you.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Теперь лети, птичка, лети, и пусть ветер несёт тебя.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Wait?
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Подожди?

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: How?
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Как?

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Non, mamie. I do NOT want to catch a bug. No bugs.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Не, бабуль. Я НЕ хочу ловить жука. Никаких жуков.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Fly to the \c[3]south\c[0] through the \c[3]bamboo trees\c[0] or something? Maybe someone in the \c[3]Cave Inn\c[0] can explain.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Летите на \c[3]юг\c[0] через \c[3]бамбуковые деревья\c[0] или типа того? Возможно, кто-то в \c[3]Пещерном трактире\c[0] сможет объяснить.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Hau Ling
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Хау Линг

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: To the \c[3]south\c[0] is where the bird needs to fly, through \c[3]bamboo trees\c[0] and beyond.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: На \c[3]юг\c[0], вот куда птица должна лететь, через \c[3]бамбуковые заросли\c[0] и за их пределы.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: And by \c[3]a pond and a fire\c[0] it needs to land.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: И у \c[3]пруда и огня\c[0] она должна приземлиться.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Now fly, little bird, fly and let the wind carry you.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Теперь лети, птичка, лети, и пусть ветер несёт тебя.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Bye...
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Пока...

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Hau Ling
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Хау Линг

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Ah... I can feel it...
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Ах... Я чувствую это...

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: The bird found \c[3]the pond and the fire\c[0], didn't it?
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Птица нашла \c[3]пруд и огонь\c[0], не так ли?

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: [nods]
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: [кивает]

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Good bird. Yes, yes.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Хорошая птица. Да-да.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Now you only need to catch the \c[3]bugs\c[0]!
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Теперь тебе нужно лишь поймать \c[3]жуков\c[0]!

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Hau Ling
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Хау Линг

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: The Bird again? Hm...
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Снова птица? Хм...

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: I see the worm found the falling rock.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Я вижу, что червь нашёл падающий камень.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Now it can pass the grand door to the light.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Теперь он может пройти через великую дверь к свету.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Now, don't clip your wings my bird, yes yes.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Ну же, не подрезай свои крылья, птичка моя, да-да.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Why didn't you take the deal?
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Почему ты не пошёл на сделку?

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: You mean the player offering real cash?
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Ты имеешь в виду игрока, предлагающего реальные деньги?

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Yeah.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Да.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Sounded \c[3]way too shady\c[0] for my taste.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Звучит \c[3]слишком подозрительно\c[0], как по мне.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: How?
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Как?

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Oh, hey. You mean the money thing?
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: О, хей. Ты про эту историю с деньгами?

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: [nods]
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: [кивает]

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Yeah, some dude just offered me money to deliver some kind of package.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Да, какой-то чувак только что предложил мне деньги, чтобы доставить какую-то посылку.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Just looking at his grin gave me the creeps.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: От одной его ухмылки у меня пошли мурашки по коже.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: "Money" Clue
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Улика "Деньги"

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Look, there is some perfectly regular bamboo right in that river, cute.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Смотри, там совершенно правильный бамбук прямо в реке, мило.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: There's bamboo in the middle of river.\. Very regular bamboo, too.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Бамбук посередине реки.\. И к тому же очень правильный бамбук.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Spheromancer Lea! Here you can see a prime example of perfectly regular bamboo!
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Сферомант Лея! Здесь ты можешь увидеть отличный пример совершенно правильного бамбука!

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Whoa, such normal bamboo. I want perfectly regular bamboo like that for my garden, too.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Ух ты, такой обычный бамбук. Я тоже хочу такой совершенно правильный бамбук в своём саду.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Oh, look! That is some lovely regular bamboo, right on that river.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Ох, смотри! Какой прекрасный правильный бамбук, прямо на этой реке.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: [nods]
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: [кивает]

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Can't stop, won't stop.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Не могу остановиться и не буду!

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: He is doing it everyday.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Он делает это каждый день.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Says it keeps him fit.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Говорит, что это помогает ему быть в форме.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Fit? We are inside a game, how does that work?
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: В форме? Мы находимся внутри игры, как это работает?

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Well...\.\.\. You are as fit as you feel, I guess.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Ну...\.\.\. Ты в форме настолько, насколько себя ощущаешь, я так думаю.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Ling Ling
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Линг Линг

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Hi!
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Привет!

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Hi!
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Привет!

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: The name is Ling Ling and I'm the youngest of the \c[3]Lings\c[0].
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Меня зовут Линг Линг, я самая младшая из \c[3]Лингов\c[0].

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Well, technically my brother and I are the youngest, since we are twins...
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Хотя, технически, младшие мы с братом, так как мы близнецы...

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: But I'm the youngest female!
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Но я самая младшая из женщин!

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: So tell me about the big cities! I always wanted to go, but my mother keeps saying that I'm too young, sadly.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Расскажи мне о больших городах! Я всегда хотела в них побывать, но увы - моя мама постоянно говорит, что я слишком маленькая.
...Привет?

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Oh, is that so? Wow, that is so cool! Please come back and tell me more, okay?
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Ох, вот так? Вау, это так круто! Пожалуйста, возвращайся и расскажи ещё, хорошо?

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Oh...\. Nice view from up here, non?
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Ох...\. Отличный вид отсюда, не?

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: [nods]
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: [кивает]

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: This really would be such a nice location if it weren't for all those bugs...
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Это место действительно могло бы быть таким хорошим, если бы не все эти жуки...

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Perfectly regular bamboo
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Совершенно правильный бамбук

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: PuellaDocta
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: PuellaDocta

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Boo!
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Буу!

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Hi!
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Привет!

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: I see you've arrived at the Cave Inn.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Я вижу, что ты прибыла к Пещерному трактиру.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Now you just have to sit tight and wait for the perfect moment.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Теперь тебе нужно просто сидеть и ждать идеального момента.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Yeah, it's like Wervyn says, there's a fine line between being early, late, and right on time.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Да, как говорит Вервин, есть тонкая грань между раньше, позже, и точно вовремя.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: And you don't have our finely-tuned senses yet.\. But don't worry!
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: И у тебя пока нет наших тонко настроенных чувств.\. Но не волнуйся!

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Since you're new, I'll let you know when it's time to move out!
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Поскольку ты новенькая, я дам тебе знать, когда придёт время выдвигаться!

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: And I have a feeling you won't have to wait too long!
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: И у меня такое чувство, что тебе не придётся долго ждать!

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: [nods]
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: [кивает]

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Thanks again, Lea!\. PuellaDocta out!
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Ещё раз спасибо, Лея!\. PuellaDocta уходит!

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: So...\. we have to wait?\. Okay.\. Hopefully not for too long.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Так...\. нам нужно ждать?\. Хорошо.\. Надеюсь, что не слишком долго.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Hm. Didn't expect to get involved in this field of work again...
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Хм. Не ожидал, что ввяжусь в эту сферу деятельности снова...

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Well... I suppose waiting is all there is to do now.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Ну... я полагаю, что всё, что нужно делать сейчас - это ждать.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: This is certainly not the most exciting task.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Определённо не самая захватывающая задача.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: This is a good opportunity to just soak up the atmosphere of this place.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Это хорошая возможность окунуться в атмосферу этого места.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Hm... No surprise they have trouble finding volunteers doing this kind of work.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Хм... Неудивительно, что им трудно найти добровольцев, выполняющих такую работу.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: PuellaDocta
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: PuellaDocta

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Lea, it's time!
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Лея, пора!

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: A fellow player is in dire need in \c[3]River Road\c[0] right to the \c[3]west\c[0]!
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Товарищ-игрок нуждается в помощи на \c[3]Речной дороге\c[0] прямо на \c[3]западе\c[0]!

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Let's be quick! Time waits for no man!\. Or woman!
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Давай быстрее! Время мужчину не ждёт!\. Или женщину!

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Lea!
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Лея!

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Aaand...\. more waiting.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Иииии...\. снова ждать.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Always this waiting for the perfect moment. So bothersome.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Постоянное ожидание этого идеального момента. Так надоедливо.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Right...\. back on standby.\. Let us hope there will be another person to rescue soon.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Верно...\. возвращение в режим ожидания.\. Будем надеяться, что скоро появится ещё один человек, которого нужно спасти.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: PuellaDocta
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: PuellaDocta

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Uh...\. Lea?\. Remember that guy from before?
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Эм...\. Лея?\. Помнишь того парня?

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: It looks like he's in trouble again.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Похоже, что он снова в беде.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Why?
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Почему?

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Heck if I know!\. Anyway he's currently in \c[3]North East Path\c[0]!
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Чёрт возьми, откуда я знаю!\. В общем, он сейчас на \c[3]Северо-восточном пути\c[0]!

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Better hurry!
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Лучше поспешить!

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: [nods]
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: [кивает]

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Kat
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Кат

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Hello, fellow seeker!
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Привет, коллега-искатель!

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Hi!
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Привет!

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Hm... I'm currently looking for help, but \c[3]just one person\c[0], not a whole party.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Хм... Я ищу помощи, но \c[3]лишь одного человека\c[0], не целой группы.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Just talk to me again, if you happen to be by yourself later.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Просто поговори со мной снова, если вдруг окажешься одна.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: [nods]
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: [кивает]

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Perhaps you saw my posting in the Quest Hub.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Полагаю, что ты увидела моё объявление в Квест-хабе.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: I'm looking for some help with a little bit of...\. exploration.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Мне нужна помощь с небольшим...\. исследованием.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: But there is something you should know about this first.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Но есть кое-что, что ты должна знать с самого начала.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Let's just say we might see a few things that no one is supposed to see.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Скажем так, мы можем увидеть несколько вещей, которые никто не должен видеть.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: And in order to do this...\. we might have to break this game...\. a tiny little bit!
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: И чтобы это сделать...\. возможно, что нам придётся сломать эту игру...\. самую малость!

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Oh, but don't worry about it!
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Ох, но не волнуйся об этом!

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: We'll both be fine as long as we handle it confidentially.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: С нами всё будет в порядке до тех пор, пока это всё конфиденциально.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: We just have to make sure none of the officials learn about this.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Мы просто должны убедиться, чтобы никто из обслуживающего персонала не узнал об этом.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: So in short: I'm looking for someone who can keep a secret.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Короче говоря: я ищу кого-то, кто может хранить тайну.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Now that I think about it...\. you haven't said terribly much so far, huh?
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Я тут подумала...\. ты же до сих пор почти ничего не сказала.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Does that mean...\. do you have problems with your speech module?
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Значит ли это, что...\. у тебя проблемы с речевым модулем?

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: [nods]
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: [кивает]

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Oh, perfect!
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: О, идеально!

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: That means you'll have a hard time sharing any of this in the first place!
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Это значит, что тебе будет сложно поделиться информацией с кем-нибудь!

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: So what do you say?\. Do you want to help me?
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Так что скажешь?\. Хочешь мне помочь?

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: I promise it will be exciting!
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Я обещаю, что это будет увлекательно!

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Uhm, Lea?
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Эмм, Лея?

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: [nods]
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: [кивает]

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Great!\. In that case, let's meet in \c[3]Maroon Valley - Barren Arcs\c[0]!
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Здорово!\. В таком случае, давай встретимся в \c[3]Бордовой долине в Бесплодных арках\c[0]!

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Oh and just so you know, I'll need to switch my avatar.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Ох, и просто, чтобы ты знала, мне будет нужно переключить свой аватар.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: The name will be \c[3]Kit\c[0].
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Имя будет \c[3]Кит\c[0].

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Lea!
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Лея!

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Oh, yes!\. Nice to meet you Lea!
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Ах, да!\. Приятно познакомиться, Лея!

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: I'll contact you via D-Link when you arrive!
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Я свяжусь с тобой через прямую связь, когда ты прибудешь на место!

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: See you soon!
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Скоро увидимся!

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Bye!
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Пока!

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Logout
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Выход из игры

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Lea...?\. Are you really sure this is a good idea?
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Лея...?\. Ты точно уверена, что это хорошая идея?

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: I know we have broken the rules before but...
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Я знаю, что мы нарушали правила раньше, но...

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: I honestly have no idea what this player is up to.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Я честно не знаю, что этот игрок задумал.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: [shakes head]
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: [мотает головой]

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Dang it...
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Чёрт...

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Seems like everybody is too afraid to break the game.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Похоже, что все слишком боятся сломать игру.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Even if it's just a little.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Даже совсем чуть-чуть.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: It's honestly not so bad though!
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Хотя честно говоря, не всё так плохо!

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: That was a good choice.\. Better not get into risky business like this.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Это был правильный выбор.\. Лучше не впутываться в подобные сомнительные дела.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: You have to wonder how they would be able to grow the bamboo so densely...
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Интересно, как они выращивают бамбук так плотно...

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Maybe that's what the giant shoots around here are for.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Может быть, для этого и существуют эти гигантские побеги повсюду.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: They grow into a ton of bamboo stalks!
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Они вырастают в кучу бамбуковых стеблей!

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Then they make more shoots, and it creates a whole forest almost instantly!
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Затем они дают ещё больше побегов, и это почти сразу создаёт целый лес!

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: ... I was going to suggest someone out there just really likes gardening.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: ...Я собиралась предположить, что кому-то здесь просто очень нравится садоводство.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Challenge Note
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Заметка об испытании

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig:
The duel will take place at
\c[3]Sapphire Ridge - North West Path\c[0].
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Дуэль состоится в \c[3]Сапфировом крае - Северо-западный путь\c[0].

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig:
The duel shall start 
when the area has been 
\c[3]ridden of all other opponents\c[0].
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text:
Дуэль следует начинать,
когда область будет
\c[3]очищена от прочих противников\c[0].
